title: OpenCV get Stuck in Transform when used in DataLoader
body_html:
I'm using cv2.cvtColor() and cv2.warpPerspective to create new transforms. But the transforms get stuck at the above functions, when they are called DataSet's getitem function.

I tested the the transform in separate contexts, and they are working well.

After a few minutes, console threw out:
^CTraceback (most recent call last): File "EyeDataset.py", line 232, in <module> test() File "EyeDataset.py", line 225, in test for i, data in enumerate(dataloader, 0): File "/Users/home/anaconda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 168, in __next__ idx, batch = self.data_queue.get() File "/Users/home/anaconda/lib/python2.7/multiprocessing/queues.py", line 378, in get return recv() File "/Users/home/anaconda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/multiprocessing/queue.py", line 21, in recv buf = self.recv_bytes()
body_text:
I'm using cv2.cvtColor() and cv2.warpPerspective to create new transforms. But the transforms get stuck at the above functions, when they are called DataSet's getitem function.
I tested the the transform in separate contexts, and they are working well.
After a few minutes, console threw out:
^CTraceback (most recent call last): File "EyeDataset.py", line 232, in <module> test() File "EyeDataset.py", line 225, in test for i, data in enumerate(dataloader, 0): File "/Users/home/anaconda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 168, in __next__ idx, batch = self.data_queue.get() File "/Users/home/anaconda/lib/python2.7/multiprocessing/queues.py", line 378, in get return recv() File "/Users/home/anaconda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/multiprocessing/queue.py", line 21, in recv buf = self.recv_bytes()
body:
I'm using cv2.cvtColor() and cv2.warpPerspective to create new transforms. But the transforms get stuck at the above functions, when they are called DataSet's getitem function.

I tested the the transform in separate contexts, and they are working well.

After a few minutes, console threw out: 
`^CTraceback (most recent call last):
  File "EyeDataset.py", line 232, in <module>
    test()
  File "EyeDataset.py", line 225, in test
    for i, data in enumerate(dataloader, 0):
  File "/Users/home/anaconda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 168, in __next__
    idx, batch = self.data_queue.get()
  File "/Users/home/anaconda/lib/python2.7/multiprocessing/queues.py", line 378, in get
    return recv()
  File "/Users/home/anaconda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/multiprocessing/queue.py", line 21, in recv
    buf = self.recv_bytes()`
